&website;
People involved in the Tockit project
Currently there are mainly two people working on this project:
Peter Becker
Peter is currently the main developer and project and project administrator -- mainly due to the fact that he is the only one paid for working on the project. He currently works for the Distributed Systems Technology Center and is located at the Knowledge, Visualization and Ordering Laboratories in Gold Coast, Australia.
Until last year he worked for NaviCon where he developed Cernato, a program for Formal Concept Analysis.
Jo Hereth
Jo is currently working on his Ph.D. thesis at Darmstadt University of Technology and is a member of the research group on Formal Concept Analysis.
After some years of theoretical experience with Formal Concept Analysis while studying he gained some programming experience when working at NaviCon.
